name: Sure Shot (2002)
description: Hailed as a "gem" by PC Utilties magazine, this game offers an innovative spin on the shoot 'em-up genre. You play as two soldiers working together to liberate an entire island full of hostile enemies - and there's only one way they can pull it off. Help them execute their risky Sure Shot tactic, as you follow their journey through 25 unique areas. Complete with a fully customizable training mode...
